name: Prince Renathal

artistName: L. Lullabi & I. Campelo da Silva

flavorText: Hedanis has won over the hearts and minds of millions of fans all over Azeroth! Shadow magic had nothing to do with it - not that you asked or anything.

name: Helm of Humiliation
text: Give a minion -5/-5. Give a minion in your hand +5/+5.
flavorText: <whispers> "...and your father was a Murloc too."

name: Helya
text: Battlecry: Shuffle all three Plagues into your opponent's deck. Plagues they draw this game are unending.
flavorText: Named after the first thing Odyn said after landing a sick kickflip.

name: Hench-Clan Burglar
text: Battlecry: Discover a spell from another class.
flavorText: Sheâ€™s more of a rat burglar.

name: Holy Glowsticks
text: Lifesteal Deal 4 damage. Costs (1) if you've cast a Holy spell this turn.
flavorText: Somewhere there's a Naaru missing a couple of shards.

name: Horizon's Edge
text: Deal 3 damage randomly split among all enemies. After a friendly minion dies, reopen this.
flavorText: Originally named Horizony McHorizonface.

name: INFERNAL!
text: Taunt Battlecry: Set your hero's remaining Health to 15.
flavorText: FLAVOR TEXT!

name: Ignis, the Eternal Flame
text: Battlecry: If you've Forged a card this game, craft a custom weapon.
flavorText: ETERNAL flame? He has 4 health?!

name: Imposing Anubisath
text: Taunt Can't attack.
flavorText: He's just standing there... menacingly!

name: Infested Watcher
text: Taunt Deathrattle: Get two 1/1 Chaotic Tendrils.
flavorText: This is why you don't eat watermelon seeds.

name: Instrument Smasher
text: Whenever your weapon is destroyed, equip a random Demon Hunter weapon.
flavorText: Guitar? Nah, she plays percussion.

name: Invasive Shadeleaf
text: Deal 10 damage to an enemy minion. Save any excess in a 1-Cost Bottle.
flavorText: Don't throw shade, bottle it!

name: Jitterbug
text: Divine Shield After a friendly character loses Divine Shield, draw a card.
flavorText: The only bug that was intentional.

name: Judge Unworthy
text: Set an enemy minion's Health to 1, then deal 1 damage to all enemies.
flavorText: VEGETABLE JUSTICE!

name: Jungle Jammer
text: Deathrattle: Summon a random -Cost Beast. (Cast spells while equipped to improve!)
flavorText: When asked what animal they would be, people always say things like "I'd be wolf-lion hybrid mix. King of the jungle, but still sociable and ferocious." No, you'd be a rat.

name: Kayn Sunfury
text: Charge All friendly attacks ignore Taunt.
flavorText: "Armor and heals may slow my zeal, but fel and glaives excite me!"

name: Keyboard Soloist
text: Battlecry: If you control no other minions, summon two 1/2 Amps with Spell Damage +1.
flavorText: Give her a hand, everybody! Or maybe 4!

name: King Tide
text: Battlecry: Both players' spells cost (5) until the end of your next turn.
flavorText: blizz pls surf

name: Kodohide Drumkit
text: Deathrattle: Deal damage to all minions. (Gain Armor while equipped to improve!)
flavorText: Stolen from a druidic drum circle, now destined to make music that is actually good.

name: Lab Patron
text: Whenever you gain armor, summon another Lab Patron (once per turn).
flavorText: When a Lab Patron fails out of school, they become a Grim Patron.

name: Lamplighter
text: Battlecry: Deal damage (Improved by each turn in a row you've played an Elemental).
flavorText: The elemental licked the oil and everybody laughed.

name: Lesser Amethyst Spellstone
text: Lifesteal. Deal 3 damage to a minion. (Take damage from your cards to upgrade.)
flavorText: A purple stone Azari carved For dark hearts, craving, power-starved. The first to bow, the warlock Rin, Embraced the darkness, slew her kin.

name: Lifedrinker
text: Battlecry: Deal 3 damage to the enemy hero. Restore 3 Health to your hero.
flavorText: In a pinch, he'll also settle for Holy Water: Zero.

name: Lifeguard
text: Taunt Battlecry: The next spell you cast has Lifesteal.
flavorText: Hey, no aggro in the pool!

name: Matching Outfits
text: Transform a minion into a random one that costs (1) more, then summon a copy of it.
flavorText: On Wednesdays we wear pink!

name: Maw and Paw
text: At the end of your turn, gain 5 Corpses. At the start of your turn, spend 5 Corpses to give your hero +5 Health.
flavorText: Home is where the disfigured, rotten heart is.

name: Mechagnome Guide
text: Battlecry: Discover a spell. Forge: It costs (3) less.
flavorText: Theme park? Tropical island? Fiery pit of despair? We've got something for everyone.

name: Merch Seller
text: At the end of your turn, put a random spell on the top of your opponent's deck.
flavorText: "Sorry, we're all out of Mediums. All we've got left are Gnome, Extra Large, and Annihilan."

name: Metamorphosis
text: Swap your Hero Power to "Deal 5 damage." After 2 uses, swap it back.
flavorText: As the humble caterpillar becomes a beautiful butterfly, so too does a demon hunter become a hideous mass of writhing destruction and unfettered chaos.

name: Might of Menethil
text: Battlecry: Spend up to 3 Corpses. Freeze that many enemy minions.
flavorText: Menethil's Might, at night, fights the light, not quite the blight, right?

name: Mindbender
text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage for each card you have drawn this turn. ( )
flavorText: I like my brain unbent, thanks.

name: Mo'arg Drillfist
text: Taunt Deathrattle: Excavate a treasure.
flavorText: Also functions as the town dentist.

name: Monkey Business
text: Add 8 Bananas to your hand. Any that can't fit are randomly fed to friendly minions in play.
flavorText: Why aren't the bananas randomly split???

name: Mystery Egg
text: Miniaturize Deathrattle: Get a copy of a random Beast in your deck. It costs (4) less.
flavorText: Which came first, the Mukla or the egg?

name: Mystified To'cha
text: Battlecry: If the combined Health of both heroes is exactly 42, set your hero's Health to 42.
flavorText: We hired your elementary school math teacher to make this card.

name: Narain Soothfancy
text: Battlecry: Get two Fortunes that are copies of the top card of your deck.
flavorText: I predict... that you will be very happy with your reading!

name: Nerubian Swarmguard
text: Taunt Battlecry: Summon two copies of this minion.
flavorText: How long can this go on? Apparently even in death.

name: Nesting Golem
text: Deathrattle: Resummon this with -1/-1.
flavorText: NESTING GOLEEEEEEEEEEEEM!!!!!!! Ehâ€¦ It just doesn't feel the same.

name: Nostalgic Gnome
text: Miniaturize Rush. After this minion deals exact lethal damage on your turn, draw a card.
flavorText: She remembers Alterac Valley like it was 833 days ago.

name: Number Cruncher
text: Rush, Taunt Choose Thrice - Gain +2 Attack; or +2 Health.
flavorText: *gasp* So 7 DID eat 9!!

name: Oaken Summons
text: Gain 6 Armor. Summon a minion from your deck that costs (4) or less.
flavorText: The Guild used oak trees until they all turned to ash.

name: Obsessive Fan
text: Battlecry: Choose a minion. It has Stealth while this is alive.
flavorText: "Obsessed? No! I'm just really really really really really really really really really really into E.T.C.'s music and everything he says, does, thinks, lives, and breathes!"

name: Octo-masseuse
text: Deals octuple damage to minions.
flavorText: Oh yeah, all of those are the spots.

name: Ogre-Gang Rider
text: Rush 50% chance to give your hero +3 Attack this turn instead of attacking.
flavorText: Doesn't know his ride from his left.

name: Origami Crane
text: Taunt Battlecry: Swap Health with another minion.
flavorText: I was born with 1-Health and paper skin.

name: Overflow Surger
text: Battlecry: Summon a copy of this for each turn in a row you've played an Elemental. ( )
flavorText: The drip on this elemental is straight fire!

name: Painter's Virtue
text: Lifesteal After your hero attacks, give minions in your hand +1/+1.
flavorText: For when the Light hits the painting at a certain angle.

name: Park Panther
text: Rush. Whenever this attacks, give your hero +3 Attack this turn.
flavorText: Somebody called animal control once. It didn't work out very well for anybody.

name: Pop'gar the Putrid
text: Your Fel spells cost (2) less and have Lifesteal. Battlecry: Get two Barrels of Sludge.
flavorText: All around the arid badlands The Outlaws chased the Townsfolk Gerry had a train full of sludge POP! goes the sludge train

name: Posse Possession
text: Summon a 4/4 copy of a random minion in your opponent's hand.
flavorText: Keep your friends close, your enemies closer, and your shadows at gunpoint.

name: Pozzik, Audio Engineer
text: Battlecry: Add two 3/3 Bots to your opponent's hand. Deathrattle: Summon them for yourself.
flavorText: "I'm down here, fixin' all the Gnomish tech that breaks down mid-set while that buffoon Fizzle is up there taking pictures of the sky. YOU tell ME who's the better engineer!"

name: Prison Breaker
text: Battlecry: If you've cast 5 or more spells this game, deal 2 damage to all enemies. ( left!) (Ready!)
flavorText: Flavor fail! Demolition Renovator did it FIRST!

name: Puppet Theatre
text: Choose an enemy minion. Get a 1/1 copy of it that costs (1).
flavorText: AUDIENCE PARTICIPATION TIME!

name: Puppetmaster Dorian
text: After you draw a minion, get a 1/1 copy of it that costs (1).
flavorText: Though Dorian may officially be working under Dr. Boom, we all know who's really pulling the strings...

name: Pyrotechnician
text: After you cast a spell, add a random Fire spell to your hand.
flavorText: The difference between a pyrotechnician and a pyromaniac is a paycheck.

name: Quartzite Crusher
text: Lifesteal. Freeze any character damaged by your hero.
flavorText: It's not just a weaponâ€¦ it's a rock!

name: R.C. Rampage
text: Summon six 1/1 Hounds. Any that can't fit give the others +1/+1.
flavorText: This place has really gone to the dogs.

name: Raging Felscreamer
text: Battlecry: The next Demon you play costs (2) less.
flavorText: Screaming loudly will not reduce the cost of non-demonic goods.

name: Raylla, Sand Sculptor
text: Paladin Tourist After you cast a spell, summon a random 2-Cost minion and give it Divine Shield.
flavorText: Is this flavor text raylla the best we can do?

name: Reliquary Researcher
text: Battlecry: If you've Excavated twice, cast two random Mage Secrets.
flavorText: What good is a researcher if they're just gunna keep it all a secret?

name: Remorseless Winter
text: Deal 2 damage to all enemies. Draw a card.
flavorText: In the Badlands, this is a Rare.

name: Replicating Menace
text: Magnetic Deathrattle: Summon three 1/1 Microbots.
flavorText: It's a car! *Whomp whomp whomp* It's a robot! *Whomp whom-CRUNCH* It'sâ€¦ three.. smaller robots!

name: Resort Valet
text: Battlecry: Discover a card from the newest expansion.
flavorText: "This is my last resort!"

name: Rhythm and Roots
text: Choose One (Secretly) - Summon three 5/5 Ancients in 2 turns; or 8/8 Giants in 4 turns.
flavorText: For Zok's latest song, he decided to go back to his roots. Like the ones on a tree. Tree roots.

name: Rhythmdancer Risa
text: Rush After your hero attacks, return this to your hand and set its Cost to (1).
flavorText: Shadowstep to the left! Double jump to the right! Class cross!

name: Rowdy Partner
text: Battlecry: If you're holding another 4-Cost card, deal 4 damage.
flavorText: Rowdy, partner!

name: Royal Librarian
text: Tradeable Battlecry: Silence a minion.
flavorText: Books on how to flip the Auction House are down that way.

name: Runefueled Golem
text: Battlecry: Discover a weapon from any class.
flavorText: Hmm, glyph gauge is running low. Better fill up at the next town.

name: Saddle Up!
text: Give your minions "Deathrattle: Summon a random Beast that costs (3) or less."
flavorText: And then they rode off into the sunset, not knowing they left their stove on.

name: Sand Art Elemental
text: Miniaturize Battlecry: Give your hero +1 Attack and Windfury this turn.
flavorText: This art HURT ME!!!

name: Saronite Tol'vir
text: Taunt Whenever this is attacked, draw a card.
flavorText: Talk to the hand.

name: Sen'jin Shieldmasta
text: Taunt
flavorText: Sen'jin Village is nice, if you like trolls and dust.

name: Serenity
text: Give all enemy minions -2 Attack. Destroy any with 0 Attack.

name: Shadow Word: Ruin
text: Destroy all minions with 5 or more Attack.

name: Sharp Shipment
text: Give your weapon +2/+2.
flavorText: Pre-check is amazing these days. New rules say you don't have to take off your shoes, helmet, or daggers!

name: Sheriff Barrelbrim
text: Battlecry: If you have 20 or less Health, open the Badlands Jail.

name: Sickly Grimewalker
text: After you summon an Undead, give it Poisonous.
flavorText: Anyone want some CHEEEEEESE?

name: Sinister Soulcage
text: Give a friendly Undead +2/+2. Spend 5 Corpses to summon a copy of it.
flavorText: Also a pretty neat night light!

name: Siphon Soul
text: Destroy a minion. Restore 3 Health to your hero.
flavorText: You probably should avoid siphoning your own soul. You might create some kind of weird infinite loop.

name: Skeleton Crew
text: Battlecry: Excavate a treasure. It costs (0).
flavorText: They don't sweat, breathe or need lit candles... what more could you ask?

name: Slagmaw the Slumbering
text: Rush, Taunt Dormant for 6 turns. (Excavate to awaken 2 turns sooner!)
flavorText: You delved too greedily and too deep. You know what they awoke in the darkness of the Badlands: Rush and Taunt.

name: Sleepy Resident
text: Taunt Deathrattle: ALL other minions fall asleep.
flavorText: Shouldnâ€™t this be a Priest card?

name: Snake Oil Seller
text: Deathrattle: Shuffle 2 Tradeable Snake Oils into your opponent's deck.
flavorText: This oil is absolutely essential to your gameplan.

name: Snow Shredder
text: Costs (1) if a character is Frozen.
flavorText: "Yeah dude, snowboarding is like, totally safe. I've only ever been injured once."

name: Sonya Waterdancer
text: After you play a 1-Cost card, get a copy of it that costs (0).
flavorText: Water you dancing to?

name: Speaker Stomper
text: Tradeable Battlecry: Enemy spells cost (2) more next turn.
flavorText: Just like in Hoofloose.

name: Spectral Cutlass
text: Lifesteal Whenever you play a card from another class, gain +1 Durability.
flavorText: So sharp it can cut through a spectral tomato!

name: Spinetail Drake
text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, deal 5 damage to an enemy minion.
flavorText: Mortal enemy of Cactus Cutter.

name: Splendiferous Whizbang
text: You start the game with one of Whizbang's Experimental Decks!
flavorText: After his work at Boomsday Labs, he's taken what Dr. Boom taught him and applied it to the most important inventions of all - TOYS!!!

name: Spot the Difference
text: Discover a 3-Cost minion to summon. If your deck has no minions, repeat this.
flavorText: Ah, I see now! One of them is a picture of a Chillwind Yeti, and the other is a Blood Elf.

name: Spread the Word
text: Draw 2 cards. Costs (1) less for each Attack your hero has.
flavorText: W O R D

name: Stand Against Darkness
text: Summon five 1/1 Silver Hand Recruits.
flavorText: Or if you're too tired, you can just kind of lean against the darkness.

name: Starshooter
text: After your hero attacks, get an Arcane Shot.
flavorText: Shoot for the stars! And if you miss, just don't hit me.

name: Stoneheart King
text: Deathrattle: Summon a 2/2 Earthen that gains +2/+2 for each other Earthen you've summoned this game.
flavorText: I, too, am a king at playing Heart Stone.

name: Summoner Darkmarrow
text: Death Knight Tourist Your Deathrattles trigger twice. After you play a Deathrattle minion, destroy it.
flavorText: Some people say your name can influence what career you go into. Summoner Darkmarrow is not one of those people.

name: Tabletop Roleplayer
text: Miniaturize Battlecry: Give a friendly Demon +2 Attack and Immune this turn.
flavorText: "And then I uh... I curse them with... uh... OH! I got it! They have to speak in rhymes or they turn into a crab!"

name: Tae'thelan Bloodwatcher
text: Cards that didn't start in your deck cost (4) less (but not less than 1).
flavorText: He's a big fan of Control Death Knight live streams.

name: Tempest Hammer
text: After your hero attacks, deal 3 damage to the lowest Health enemy.
flavorText: LIKE SWATTING PESTS!

name: Thassarian
text: Reborn Battlecry and Deathrattle: Deal 2 damage to a random enemy.
flavorText: A natural born leader. And an unnatural reborn leader.

name: Theldurin the Lost
text: Battlecry: If your deck started with no duplicates, gain Immune this turn and attack all enemies.
flavorText: He might be lost, but he knows where you can find these hands.

name: Thickhide Kodo
text: Taunt Deathrattle: Gain 5 Armor.
flavorText: The introduction of professions was devastating for kodo populations.

name: Tigress Plushy
text: Miniaturize Rush, Lifesteal, Divine Shield
flavorText: The sheervalue of this card is undeniable.

name: Timber Tambourine
text: Deathrattle: Summon 5/5 (Ancient, Ancients). (Play cards that cost (5) or more while equipped to improve!)
flavorText: Timberine anyone? TIMBERINE!?

name: Time-Lost Protodrake
text: Taunt When you draw this, add a random Dragon to your hand.
flavorText: Weird way to say "late" but ok.

name: Tiny Worldbreaker
text: Battlecry: If you control another Mech, deal 4 damage.
flavorText: "I'm doing my part!"

name: Tomb Traitor
text: Battlecry: Destroy a Plague in your opponent's deck to deal 3 damage to all enemy minions.
flavorText: You enjoy raiding, I enjoying traitoring. We are not the same.

name: Tram Heist
text: Get a copy of each card your opponent played last turn.
flavorText: How are they gunna steal the whole tram!?

name: Triplewick Trickster
text: Battlecry: Deal 2 damage to a random enemy, three times.
flavorText: You no take candle! Or second candle. You can take third candle though.

name: Trust Fall
text: Discover two minions that cost (5) or less. They gain each other's Attack and Health.
flavorText: Earthmother, catch me.

name: Twilight Drake
text: Battlecry: Gain +1 Health for each card in your hand.
flavorText: Twilight drakes feed on Mystical Energy. And Tacos.

name: Twisted Frostwing
text: Rush Deathrattle: Summon a Chimaera with stats equal to this minion's Attack.
flavorText: Not currently valid in the Twist format.

name: Umpire's Grasp
text: Deathrattle: Draw a Demon and reduce its Cost by (2).
flavorText: PENALTY - FEL BALL!

name: Un'Goro Brochure
text: Draw two minions. Give them +2/+2. (Flips each turn.)
flavorText: Our Un'Goro package includes the Tortollan travel tour! Just don't mind the Devilsaurs.

name: Unchained Gladiator
text: Battlecry: Draw a card. Repeat for each Elemental you played last turn. ( )
flavorText: We can't possibly buff this card any more, just look at him!

name: Undercooked Calamari
text: Battlecry: Destroy an enemy minion with Attack less than or equal to this minion's.
flavorText: ITS RAAWWWW!!!

name: Vacation Planning
text: Restore 4 Health. Summon 3 Silver Hand Recruits. Draw 2 cards.
flavorText: Reporting for vacation!

name: Void Shard
text: Lifesteal Deal 4 damage.
flavorText: Light's easy. Void's hard.

name: Volume Up
text: Draw 3 spells. Finale: Discover a copy of one.
flavorText: You have to pay Mana to do that!? I thought it was just in the settings menu!

name: Waste Remover
text: At the end of your turn, destroy the bottom 3 cards of your deck.
flavorText: Always follow the three Rs: REDUCE their world to ash, REUSE their bones as paperweights, and RECYCLE!

name: Watercannon
text: After your hero attacks, summon a 1/1 Pirate that attacks a random enemy.
flavorText: There's a teeny tiny pirate trapped in each of the water balloons. Free them!

name: Wave Pool Thrasher
text: Battlecry: Give all other minions -1/-1. Deathrattle: Give all other minions +1/+1.
flavorText: Used to be called Wave Pool Splasher until 'The Incident'.

name: Wing Welding
text: Discard your highest Cost card. Deal damage equal to its Cost to all minions.
flavorText: This is not how you train your dragon.

name: Workshop Mishap
text: Deal 5 damage to a minion. Excess damages both neighbors. Outcast: Gain Lifesteal.
flavorText: IT HAS BEEN DAYS SINCE LAST ACCIDENT.

name: Yelling Yodeler
text: Battlecry: Trigger a friendly minion's Deathrattle twice.
flavorText: Maybe it's OK for the Grimtotem to destroy some music forever.

name: A. F. Kay
text: At the end of your turn, give all other friendly minions that didn't attack +2/+2.
flavorText: Talk to the hand 'cause the mouth is sippin'.

name: Ace Wayfinder
text: Battlecry: Gain two random bonus effects. The next Draenei you play gains them as well.
flavorText: She's the ace of space.

name: Alien Encounters
text: Summon two 2/5 Beasts with Taunt. Costs (1) less for each card you Discovered this game.
flavorText: Close encounters of the cuddly kind.

name: Altered Chord
text: Lifesteal Deal 6 damage to a minion. Costs (3) less if you're Overloaded.
flavorText: I'll never understand how bands and orchestras allow musicians that justâ€¦. play... off-key. Would love opinions on this.

name: Amateur Puppeteer
text: Miniaturize, Taunt Deathrattle: Give Undead in your hand +2/+2.
flavorText: "I'm a real toy!"

name: Aranna, Thrill Seeker
text: Priest Tourist Damage your hero takes on your turn is redirected to a random enemy.
flavorText: "Aranna, I feel like you only came to this island so you could use the zipline."

name: Army of the Dead
text: Raise up to 5 Corpses as 2/2 Risen Ghouls with Rush.
flavorText: Yesterday's army, today.

name: Askara
text: Battlecry: The next Draenei you play summons a copy of itself.
flavorText: That's Askara card!

name: Barak Kodobane
text: Battlecry: Draw a 1, 2, and 3-Cost spell.
flavorText: They say he's a pro at horseback archery.

name: Bayfin Bodybuilder
text: After a minion is summoned for your opponent during your turn, Silence and destroy it.
flavorText: Loves to run in flow motion.

name: Big Dreams
text: Summon the highest Cost Beast from your hand. It goes Dormant for 2 turns.
flavorText: Just a small town Taunka Livin' in a lonely... waunka

name: Blackrock 'n' Roll
text: Give all minions in your deck Attack and Health equal to their Cost.
flavorText: Thank goodness it's not called Black-ska Mountain.

name: Blood Treant
text: Costs Health instead of Mana.
flavorText: The blood of my enemies makes for some great fertilizer!

name: Boneshredder
text: Battlecry: Spend 5 Corpses to trigger and gain the Deathrattle of a random friendly minion that died this game.
flavorText: Is that his makeup or just his natural fur pattern?

name: Brawl
text: Destroy all minions except one. (chosen randomly)
flavorText: Do you know the first rule of Brawl Club?

name: Bridge Riff
text: Summon a 3/4 Rocker with Taunt and a 4/3 with Rush. Finale: Play your last Riff.
flavorText: Can be played in other places too.

name: Building-Block Golem
text: Rush Deathrattle: Summon three random 1-Cost minions.
flavorText: I HOPE YOU STEP ON A 1-COST MINION!

name: Burrow Buster
text: Rush Battlecry: Excavate a treasure.
flavorText: We almost went with the name "Giant Drill", but then it would've HAD to be an 8/8.

name: Carnivorous Cubicle
text: Battlecry: Destroy a friendly minion. Summon a copy of it at the end of your turns.
flavorText: Hey, no eating at your desk!

name: Carress, Cabaret Star
text: While in your hand, play two different spell schools to transform. ( left!) (Ready!)
flavorText: Some Naga use their mastery over the elements to go on villainous conquests. Others put on a show!

name: Cash Cow
text: Taunt Whenever this takes damage, get a Coin.
flavorText: Show me the moo-ney!

name: Cattle Rustler
text: Battlecry: Draw a Beast. It costs (3) less.
flavorText: What once started as a small-time cat burglary gig has turned into a life of cattle rustling. What a shame.

name: Chemical Spill
text: Summon the highest Cost minion from your hand, then deal 5 damage to it.
flavorText: I said spill the TEA, not the acid!

name: Corpse Bride
text: Battlecry: Spend up to 10 Corpses to summon a Risen Groom with Taunt and that much Attack and Health.
flavorText: Until undeath do us part.

name: Corpse Explosion
text: Detonate a Corpse to deal 1 damage to all minions. If any are still alive, repeat this.
flavorText: What? It's not like they were using them anymore.

name: Death Roll
text: Destroy an enemy minion. Deal damage equal to its Attack randomly split among all enemies.
flavorText: There's a Crocolisk on my boot!

name: Deathbringer Saurfang
text: Taunt Deathrattle: Return this to your hand. It costs Health instead of Mana.
flavorText: "In hindsight, maybe I should have let the Alliance have all the fun back at the Wrathgate."

name: Disciple of Amitus
text: At the end of your turn, summon a 2/2 Earthen that gains +2/+2 for each other Earthen you've summoned this game.
flavorText: "Oh great Amitus, I took your style advice on the poncho, but pray tell - one or two golden gloves?"

name: Disguised K'thir
text: Each turn this is in your hand, transform into a random card in your opponent's deck.
flavorText: That is not a very good disguise, dude.

name: Doctor Holli'dae
text: Battlecry: If your deck started with no duplicates, equip the Staff of the Nine Frogs.
flavorText: If anything can heal the Badlands, it is the power of frogs!

name: Doomguard
text: Charge. Battlecry: Discard two random cards.
flavorText: Summoning a doomguard is risky. Someone is going to die.

name: Dozing Dragon
text: Dormant for 2 turns. While Dormant, summon a 3/5 Dragon with Taunt at the end of your turn.
flavorText: Emerald dreams can become emerald realities.

name: Drum Soloist
text: Taunt Battlecry: If you control no other minions, gain +2/+2 and Rush.
flavorText: "Was I rushin' or was I dragon?"

name: Elite Tauren Champion
text: Finale: Start a ROCK DUEL! Players must spend all their Mana each turn or else they take 8 (or more) damage!
flavorText: Strumming his guitar with a molten ember from the first fire of Azeroth, E.T.C.'s ear-splitting, heart-wrenching, head-banging solo held back Magatha and her forces of evil, single-handedly saving music for centuries to come.

name: Eye of Chaos
text: Battlecry: Get two 1/1 Chaotic Tendrils.

name: Fireworker

name: Foamrender

flavorText: No honey, we have Shadowmourne at home.

name: Forgotten Animatronic
text: At the end of your turn, destroy a minion with less Attack than this.
flavorText: He ALWAYS comes back.

name: Frosty DÃ©cor
text: Summon two 2/4 Elementals with Taunt and "Deathrattle: Gain 4 Armor".
flavorText: "Yeah, Nature magic pays the bills, but my passion lies elsewhere."

name: Game Master Nemsy

name: Guitar Soloist

name: Gunslinger Kurtrus

name: Hemet, Foam Marksman
text: After a friendly Beast dies, get a random Legendary Beast from the past. It costs (2) less.

name: Ingenious Artificer

name: Inquisitive Creation
text: Battlecry: Deal damage to all enemy minions. (Improved by each spell school you've cast this game!)

name: Inzah

flavorText: Inzah plays the trumpet, saxophone, piano, guitar, AND bass. No wonder he's always so overloaded!

name: JIVE, INSECT!

flavorText: "WHY IS NO ONE JIVING? I SPECIFICALLY REQUESTED IT!"

name: Jotun, the Eternal
text: Battlecry: For the rest of the game, cast a copy of the first spell you draw each turn at enemies.
flavorText: He doesn't look like a turtle?

name: Justicar Trueheart

flavorText: It's like putting racing stripes and a giant spoiler on your hero power.

name: Kangor, Dancing King

name: Keeper's Strength

name: Lab Constructor
text: At the end of your turn, summon a copy of this. Forge: Gain Magnetic.

name: Lawful Longarm
text: Rush, Lifesteal Battlecry: Gain +1 Attack for each card in your hand.
flavorText: Loves to lob law bombs from his law blog.

name: Leeroy Jenkins
text: Charge. Battlecry: Summon two 1/1 Whelps for your opponent.
flavorText: At least he has Angry Chicken.

name: Lesser Emerald Spellstone
text: Summon two 3/3 Wolves. (Play a Secret to upgrade.)
flavorText: An emerald stone for Tauren hands Who sought its strength to save their lands Their tribes now lost, their rage released Whoâ€™s hunting now? And whoâ€™s the beast?

name: Living Prairie
text: Battlecry: If you played an Elemental last turn, summon two 3/3 Cows with Rush.
flavorText: Whoooooa, we're half way there Whooa-oh, -

name: Lunar Trailblazer

name: Mantle Shaper
text: Costs (1) less for each spell you've cast while holding this.

name: Manufacturing Error
text: Draw 3 cards. If your deck has no minions, they cost (3) less.
flavorText: You thought the 9-piece puzzle would be easy, didn't you?

name: Mes'Adune the Fractured
text: Battlecry: Draw an Elemental. Split it into two halves.
flavorText: Cracking open an elemental with the boys.

name: Mind Control Tech
text: Battlecry: If your opponent has 4 or more minions, take control of one.

name: Mistah Vistah

name: Momentum

name: Mutating Lifeform
text: After this survives damage, gain a random bonus effect.

name: Night Elf Huntress
text: Battlecry: Deal 3 damage to three different enemies. (You pick the targets!)

name: Nostalgic Clown

name: Ogre-Gang Ace
text: Rush Whenever this attacks, gain Divine Shield. (50% chance to gain Lifesteal instead.)

name: Opera Soloist
text: Battlecry: If you control no other minions, deal 3 damage to all enemy minions.

name: Origami Frog
text: Rush Battlecry: Swap Attack with another minion.

name: Overlord Runthak

name: Raza the Resealed
text: Battlecry: For the rest of the game, your Hero Power refreshes whenever you play a card.
flavorText: The 10th anniversary edition of a classic bestseller!

name: Remixed Rhapsody
text: Deal 3 damage to all minions. Gains an extra effect in your hand that changes each turn.
flavorText: "Is this real life?" "No, this is a card game."

name: Rin, Orchestrator of Doom
text: Taunt. Deathrattle: Both players draw 2 cards, discard 2 cards, and destroy the top 2 cards of their deck.
flavorText: Rin's orchestra is the best of the best. When your replacement is just one summoning away, you have to play perfectly.

name: Rocket Hopper
text: Rush Overload: (4)
flavorText: Are y'all gonna ask for THIS one to be orange too!?

name: Sanc'Azel
text: Rush After this attacks, turn into a location.
flavorText: That castle has some serious drip.

name: Sandbox Scoundrel
text: Miniaturize Battlecry: Your next card this turn costs (3) less.
flavorText: "Really? A bunch of fake plastic gems AGAIN!?"

name: Sauna Regular
text: Taunt Costs (1) less for each time your hero has taken damage on your turn.
flavorText: She's getting that "falls off the bone" tenderness.

name: Scrapbooking Student
text: Battlecry: Summon a copy of a friendly location.
flavorText: "â€¦and this is the time I rode a dinosaur, and this is the time that I helped solve a murder, and this is the time I got corrupted by the Old Gods..."

name: Screaming Banshee
text: Lifesteal After your hero gains Health, summon a Soul with that much Attack and Health.
flavorText: Her singing will be sure to wake you up (wake you up inside).

name: Shadow Word: Steal
text: Return an enemy minion to YOUR hand.
flavorText: Anduin will literally take your stuff and say it's a Shadow Word.

name: Shattered Reflections
text: Choose a non-Titan minion. Add a copy of it to your deck and battlefield.

name: Shoplifter Goldbeard

name: Sky Mother Aviana
text: Battlecry: Shuffle 10 random Legendary minions into your deck. They cost (1).

name: Sleet Skater
text: Miniaturize Battlecry: Freeze an enemy minion. Gain Armor equal to its Attack.

name: Spurfang
text: Battlecry and Deathrattle: Summon a random Beast with Cost equal to this minion's Attack.

name: Star Power
text: Deal 5 damage to a random enemy minion. Repeat this with 1 less damage.

name: Star Vulpera

name: Starscale Constellar
text: Spellburst: Double this minion's Attack.

name: Stranglethorn Tiger
text: Stealth

name: Summer Flowerchild
text: Battlecry: Draw two cards that cost (6) or more. Finale: They cost (1) less.

name: Sunsapper Lynessa
text: Rogue Tourist Your spells that cost (2) or less cast twice.

name: Surfalopod

name: Swarm of Lightbugs

name: Symphony of Sins
text: Discover and play a Movement. Shuffle the other 6 into your deck.

name: Taelan Fordring
text: Taunt, Divine Shield Deathrattle: Draw your highest Cost minion.

name: Tainted Remnant
text: Battlecry: If you played an Elemental last turn, deal 7 damage randomly split between all enemies.

name: Tram Operator
text: Battlecry: Draw a Mech. The next Mech you play costs (2) less.

name: Twilight Medium
text: Taunt Battlecry: Set the Cost of the top card of your deck to (1).

name: Tyr's Tears
text: Resurrect 3 different minions from your class. Set their stats to 2/2. Forge: Resurrect another.
flavorText: Liek this if u cri evertim

name: Wargear
text: Magnetic
flavorText: WAR! GEAR! What is it good for?

name: Warsong Grunt
text: Rush. After this attacks and kills a minion, it may attack again.

name: Wave of Nostalgia
text: Transform ALL minions into random Legendary ones from the past.

text: Miniaturize Battlecry: Discover a Demon. Set its stats and Cost to this minion's.
flavorText: OMG THAT'S LITERALLY ME!

text: Draw 2 cards. Costs (1) less for each different spell school you've cast this game.

name: Wishing Well
text: After you play a Coin, get a random Legendary minion from another class and set its Cost to (1).

text: Summon two 2/5 Beetles with Taunt. Costs (3) less if you have Spell Damage.

name: Blast Tortoise
text: Taunt Battlecry: Deal damage to all enemy minions equal to this minion's Attack.

text: Battlecry: Excavate a treasure. For each card in your hand, deal 1 damage to a random enemy.

name: Blizzard
text: Deal 2 damage to all enemy minions and Freeze them.

name: Boulderfist Ogre
flavorText: "ME HAVE GOOD STATS FOR THE COST"

name: Chaos Creation
text: Deal 5 damage. Summon a random 5-Cost minion. Destroy the bottom 5 cards of your deck.

name: Cho'gall, Twilight Chieftain

name: Clay Matriarch
text: Miniaturize Taunt. Deathrattle: Summon a 4/4 Whelp with Elusive.

name: Cliff Dive
text: Summon 2 minions from your deck and give them Rush. They go back at the end of your turn.

name: Climbing Hook
text: Doesn't lose Durability while you control a minion with 5 or more Attack.

name: Crash of Thunder
text: Deal 3 damage to all enemies. Costs (1) less for each Nature spell you've cast this turn.
flavorText: ERROR: Lightning.exe has stopped working.

name: Cruise Captain Lora
text: Battlecry: Summon 2 random locations.
flavorText: To your left is our award winning spa area! And to the right, THE PRISON OF YOGG-SARON!

name: Crystal Cluster
text: Gain three empty Mana Crystals. Any that can't fit summon a 3/7 Elemental with Taunt.
flavorText: And if you can't fit any of the Elementalsâ€¦ do better.

name: Dirge of Despair

name: Dr. Stitchensew
text: Battlecry: Discover a 5, 3, and 1-Cost minion to stitch to this. Deathrattle: Summon the 5-Cost minion.

name: Dread Deserter
text: Has Charge if this didn't start in your deck.
flavorText: "I uh... need to go walk my uhâ€¦ fish."

name: Druid of the Claw
text: Choose One - Transform into a 7/6 with Rush; or a 4/9 with Taunt.
flavorText: Cat or Bear? Cat or Bear?! I just cannot CHOOSE!

name: Evasive Wyrm
text: Rush Divine Shield Elusive
flavorText: Deftly dodges spells like a real wiggle wyrm.

name: Fire Elemental
text: Battlecry: Deal 4 damage.
flavorText: He can never take a bath. Ewww.

name: Flame Behemoth
text: Battlecry: Get two random Magnetic Mechs. They cost (2) less.
flavorText: Always look both ways before crossing the Formation Grounds.

name: Flik Skyshiv
text: Battlecry: Destroy a minion and all copies of it (wherever they are).
flavorText: Junior explorers scan the night sky in fear of her candleâ€™s flame!

name: Frostmourne
text: Deathrattle: Summon every minion killed by this weapon.
flavorText: Death Nights, Frost Morn, what's next - Blood Noon?

name: Furious Fowls
text: Choose an enemy. Summon two 3/3 Birds with Immune while attacking to attack it.
flavorText: They were already mad and you had to call them 'foul'??

name: Gnome Muncher
text: Taunt, Lifesteal At the end of your turn, attack the lowest Health enemy.
flavorText: Gnom gnom gnom.

name: Gnomelia, S.A.F.E. Pilot
text: Rush. Also damages minions next to whomever this attacks. Deathrattle: Deal 2 damage to all enemies.
flavorText: Never learned how to L.A.N.D.

name: Golganneth, the Thunderer
text: Titan Your first spell each turn costs (3) less.
flavorText: With dominion over the seas and skies, Golganneth fearlessly wields the power of nature to serve the Pantheon.

name: Hamm, the Hungry
text: Druid Tourist Taunt. At the end of your turn, eat a minion in the enemy's deck to gain +2/+2.
flavorText: Do tauren have four stomachs?

name: Hammer of the Naaru
text: Battlecry: Summon a 6/6 Holy Elemental with Taunt.
flavorText: The naaru wasn't using it. It doesn't have arms.

name: Harmonic Pop
text: Deal 3 damage to all minions. Summon a 6/6 Popstar. (Swaps each turn.)

name: Harth Stonebrew
text: Battlecry: Replace your hand with an iconic one from Hearthstone's past. (Once per game)

name: Hollow Hound
text: Lifesteal, Rush Also damages minions next to whomever this attacks.

name: Horn of the Windlord
text: Windfury Whenever your hero attacks a minion, set its stats to 3/3.

name: Incindius
text: At the end of your turn, upgrade your Eruptions. Battlecry: Shuffle 5 of them into your deck.

name: Khaz'goroth
text: Titan After this uses an ability, gain Immune this turn and attack a random enemy minion.

name: Kingpin Pud

flavorText: The good, the bad, and the ugly stats for the Cost.

name: Lead Dancer
text: Deathrattle: Summon a minion from your deck with less Attack than this minion.
flavorText: "Follow my lead!" *dies*

name: Li'Na, Shop Manager
text: Whenever you cast a spell, fill your board with random minions of that Cost.
flavorText: Somebody has to do the paperwork around here.

name: Lightbomb
text: Deal damage to each minion equal to its Attack.
flavorText: This is what happens when you allow goblins to be priests.

name: Lightfused Manasaber
text: Rush Spellburst: Gain Divine Shield.
flavorText: Oh no, I ran out of fused Mana!

name: Loken, Jailer of Yogg-Saron
text: Battlecry: Discover a minion from your deck. Summon a Tentacle with its stats and Taunt.
flavorText: Really great at his job! - Yogg-Saron

name: Marrow Manipulator
text: Battlecry: Spend up to 5 Corpses. Deal 2 damage to a random enemy for each.

name: Midnight Wolf
text: Rush Outcast: Summon a copy of this.
flavorText: Three of these would make for an EPIC T-shirt.

name: Minotauren
text: Rush Whenever this minion deals damage, gain that much Armor.

name: Mister Mukla
text: Rush. Battlecry: Fill your opponent's hand with Bananas.

name: Norgannon
text: Titan After this uses an ability, double the power of the other abilities.
flavorText: His tremendous arcane magic was strong enough to save all of the spirits of the titans after Sargeras destroyed their physical forms.

name: Obsidian Revenant
text: Taunt Deathrattle: Summon two random Deathrattle minions that cost (3) or less.
flavorText: What is this? A Reven for Ants?!

name: Once Upon a Time...
text: Summon a random 3-Cost Beast, Dragon, Elemental, and Murloc.
flavorText: ...There was a humble little squirrel on a quest to defeat an evil dragon. With the help of its earthen friend, it saved the murloc princess from danger. The end.

name: Origami Dragon
text: Divine Shield, Lifesteal Battlecry: Swap stats with another minion.
flavorText: The fire will give you a papercut, which CAN burn. Does that count?

name: Package Dealer
text: After you draw a card, 50% chance to draw another.
flavorText: I'm always getting my neighbor's mail. And my other neighbor. And my other neighbor. I'm stealing their packages.

name: Party Planner Vona
text: Battlecry: If you've taken 8 damage on your turns, summon Ourobos. ( left!) (Ready!)
flavorText: She's known for her popular "occult ritual to summon an otherworldly being" parties.

name: Portalmancer Skyla
text: Rogue Tourist Battlecry: Swap the Costs of the lowest and highest Cost spells in your hand.
flavorText: "Say goodbye to red-eye gryphon flights!"

name: Power Spike
text: Deal 4 damage. Give a random friendly minion +4/+4.
flavorText: Jeff, when I said this deck needs a power spike I did not mean it like that.

name: Puzzlemaster Khadgar
text: Battlecry: Equip a 0/6 Wisdomball that casts helpful Mage spells!
flavorText: Khadgar Khadgar in the ball, who is the smartest white-haired, tall, handsome mage of them all?

name: Ra-den
text: Taunt. Deathrattle: Summon each other minion you've played this game that did not start in your deck.
flavorText: Regularly participates in Immortal Combat.

name: Razzle-Dazzler
text: Battlecry: Summon a random 5-Cost minion. Repeat for each spell school you've cast this game. ( )
flavorText: Look out Dancin' Deryl, he's coming for your job.

name: Sanitize
text: Deal damage equal to your Armor to all minions. Forge: Gain 4 Armor first.

name: Savannah Highmane
text: Deathrattle: Summon two 2/2 Hyenas.

name: Sensory Deprivation
text: Summon a copy of an enemy minion. If you have 20 or less Health, destroy the original.
flavorText: You'll come out a new person.

name: Shield of Askara
text: Taunt Divine Shield Lifesteal
flavorText: One can never have too many shields.

name: Shudderblock
text: Miniaturize Battlecry: Your next Battlecry triggers 3 times, but can't damage the enemy hero.
flavorText: Beware the hinges that pinch, the scales that splinter!

name: Sif
text: Spell Damage + (Improved by each spell school you've cast this game!)

name: Spikeridged Steed
text: Give a minion +2/+6 and Taunt. When it dies, summon a Stegodon.
flavorText: What beats cavalry? Dinosaur cavalry.

name: Spirit Peddler
text: Rush Deathrattle: Reduce the Cost of a random minion in your hand by (6).
flavorText: *facepalm* I asked for an art piece of a ghost on a bicycle...

name: Starstrung Bow
text: Costs (1) less for each friendly Secret that has triggered this game.
flavorText: Shoot for the stars, but if you miss, aim for the enemy hero.

name: Stone Drake
text: Divine Shield, Taunt, Lifesteal, Elusive
flavorText: "I am the great Stone Drake - good morning!"

name: Sunspot Dragon
text: Tradeable, Lifesteal Quickdraw: Deal 6 damage.
flavorText: THIS is why you shouldn't look directly at the sun.

name: Sylvanas Windrunner
text: Deathrattle: Take control of a random enemy minion.
flavorText: Sylvanas was turned into the Banshee Queen by Arthas, but he probably should have just killed her because it just pissed her off.

name: Testing Dummy
text: Taunt Deathrattle: Deal 8 damage randomly split among all enemies.
flavorText: Don't worry, they're having a blast. MUAHAHAHAHAAAA!

name: The Badlands Bandits
text: Get eight 3/2 Bandits with bonus effects. Any that can't fit in your hand are summoned instead.
flavorText: Bandits... ASSEMBLE!

name: The Headless Horseman
text: Battlecry: Destroy the enemy minion with the most Attack! Shuffle my Head into your deck, you must get it back!
flavorText: This flavor text, you would expect to rhyme and reference, to great effect! It starts out strong, but as you can tell it doesn't end very good.

name: Thing from Below
text: Taunt Costs (1) less for each Totem you've summoned this game.
flavorText: Just can't resist the opportunity to hang around with a bunch of totems.

name: Toyrantus
text: Taunt, Elusive Battlecry: If you have 10 Mana Crystals, gain +7/+7.
flavorText: Dr. Boom was definitely a dinosaur kid.

name: Travel Security
text: Taunt. Deathrattle: Summon a random 8-Cost minion.
flavorText: "You're just gonna let ANY 8-Cost minion get past you!?" "...Yeah..."

name: Tyr
text: Battlecry: Resurrect a 2, 3, and 4-Attack minion from your class.
flavorText: Brought me back to life, S Tyr card.

name: Under the Sea
text: Draw a different spell. Summon a random minion of that spell's Cost.
flavorText: Spacebar

name: Unpopular Has-Been
text: Deathrattle: Summon a random 5-Cost minion from the past.
flavorText: Oh man, she used to rock more than ANYONE back in the Year of the Kraken. I wish I could've seen her perform back thenâ€¦

name: V-07-TR-0N Prime
text: T1T4N This minion's abilities repeat on another random friendly minion.
flavorText: Long after the titans' departure, Mimiron dreamed of creating something with an approximation of their power. He may have actually succeeded!

name: Weapons Attendant
text: Battlecry: If you control another Pirate, equip a random weapon from your deck.
flavorText: Hotel policy states that you must leave your weapons at the front desk. But GOOD NEWS! You can also buy weapons at the back desk!!

name: Wind-Up Enforcer
text: Tradeable Battlecry: Summon (copy, copies) of this minion. (Trade to upgrade!)
flavorText: Code 6404.5 clearly states that all Enforcers remain in their packaging until told by authorized personnel.

name: Wind-Up Musician
text: Tradeable Battlecry: Deal damage to all enemy minions. (Trade to upgrade!)
flavorText: Sure to wind up your opponents.

name: Xor'toth, Breaker of Stars
text: Battlecry: Add two Stars to both sides of your hand. When they collide, deal 5 damage to all enemies.
flavorText: We started his stats at 50,000,000,000/50,000,000,000 to be lore-accurate, but it was just a nudge too powerful.

name: Zok Fogsnout
text: Battlecry: Summon two / Quilboar with Taunt. (Improved by your hero Attack & Armor gained this turn!)
flavorText: Despite having only 3 digits on each hand, Zok plays Bass like he has 5.

name: Abyssal Bassist
text: Taunt, Lifesteal Costs (2) less for each weapon you've equipped this game.
flavorText: DROP THE BASS (INTO THE ABYSS)!

name: All Terrain Voidhound
text: Whenever this attacks, give your hero +5 Attack this turn.
flavorText: 4 claw drive, independent joint suspension AND a 7 mana warranty? Where do I sign?

name: Aman'Thul
text: Titan After this uses an ability, Discover any Legendary minion.
flavorText: The leader of the titans was the first to awaken. In his loneliness, he sought out other titans across many different worlds, and together, they formed the Pantheon.

name: Amitus, the Peacekeeper
text: Titan Taunt. Your minions can't take more than 2 damage at a time.
flavorText: As a champion of harmony, Amitus abstained from the Pantheon's many conflicts until one day, shortly after the corruption of Sargeras, she vanished altogether.

name: Ancient of Growth
text: Choose One - Summon three 2/2 Treants; or Transform your Treants into 5/5 Ancients with Taunt.
flavorText: Who passed greenhouse gas?

name: Ancient of Lore
text: Choose One - Draw 2 cards; or Restore 7 Health.
flavorText: Go ahead, carve your initials in him.

name: Arch-Villain Rafaam
text: Taunt Battlecry: Replace your hand and deck with Legendary minions.
flavorText: Minions must wash hands before being LIQUIDATED AND REPLACED BY SOMEONE BETTER.

name: Archimonde
text: Battlecry: Summon every Demon you played this game that didn't start in your deck.
flavorText: Archimonde joined Sargeras in search of power, and in doing so became one of the strongest forces within the Burning Legion who laid waste to countless planetsâ€¦ but in the end he still lost to a wisp.

name: Argus, the Emerald Star
text: Titan Minions to the left of this have Rush, and ones to the right have Lifesteal.
flavorText: Once a proud titan, Argus was fated to meet a darker end. Sargeras and his demons would later corrupt and shatter Argus to use his power for themselves.

name: Arkwing Pilot
text: At the end of your turn, deal 3 damage to a random enemy. Spellburst: Summon an Arkwing Pilot.
flavorText: Delivered in under 30 minutes, or your Arkwings are free!

name: Badlands Brawler
text: Battlecry: Start a Brawl! If you've Excavated twice, this always wins.
flavorText: Watch out watch out watch out - R.K.O. outta nowhere!

name: Baron Geddon
text: At the end of your turn, deal 2 damage to ALL other characters.
flavorText: Baron Geddon was Ragnaros's foremost lieutenant, until he got FIRED.

name: Beached Whale
text: Taunt Battlecry: Deal 10 damage to this minion.
flavorText: Call me Illidan. Some years ago â€” never mind how long precisely â€” having little or no gold in my purse, and nothing particular to interest me on Azeroth, I thought I would fly about a little and see the demony part of the worldâ€¦

name: Bouldering Buddy
text: Rush, Taunt Costs (1) if you have at least 10 Mana Crystals.
flavorText: Why would you buy a walking stick when the forest is full of them!?

name: Catrina Muerte
text: At the end of your turn, resurrect another friendly Undead minion.
flavorText: She always manages to lift your spirits.

name: Containment Unit
text: Magnetic Deathrattle: Summon a random 8-Cost minion.
flavorText: Surprisingly ticklish.

name: Crafter's Aura
text: At the end of your turn, summon a random 6-Cost minion. Lasts turns.
flavorText: She has at LEAST Craftsmanship +3.

name: Doomkin
text: Battlecry: Take one of your opponent's empty Mana Crystals.
flavorText: Now THIS is Mana cheating.

name: Dragon Golem
text: Taunt Battlecry: Summon a copy of this for each Dragon in your hand.
flavorText: I have a Dragon, I have a Golem. UH! Dragon Golem!

name: Drum Circle
text: Choose One - Summon five 2/2 Treants; or Give your minions +2/+4 and Taunt.
flavorText: It's more of a drum pentagon, really.

name: Elemental Inspiration
text: For each spell school you have cast this game, summon a 4/5 Vortex with a random bonus effect. ( )
flavorText: No Hero Power required.

name: Eredar Brute
text: Taunt, Lifesteal Costs (1) less for each enemy minion.
flavorText: After a while, the glowing purple stress ball became ineffective at containing his rage.

name: Expendable Performers
text: Summon seven 1/1 Illidari with Rush. If they all die this turn, summon seven more.
flavorText: When someone gets injured, it's considered performance art.

name: Firelands Portal
text: Deal 6 damage. Summon a random 6-Cost minion.
flavorText: Come to beautiful Firelands! Where it's "Way nicer than the Abyssal Maw!"

name: Flamestrike
text: Deal 5 damage to all enemy minions.
flavorText: When the ground is on fire, you should not stop, drop, and roll.

name: Frostwyrm's Fury
text: Deal 5 damage. Freeze all enemy minions. Summon a 5/5 Frostwyrm.
flavorText: Terrible destruction, but minty fresh breath!

name: Galactic Crusader
text: Taunt Deathrattle: Get two random Holy spells. They cost (3) less.
flavorText: The will was very specific that in the event of the Crusader's death, you were to inherit these random spells. Very odd.

name: General Vezax
text: Rush Battlecry: Gain 4 Armor. Deathrattle: Lose 4 Armor to resummon this.
flavorText: Contrast this with Specific Vezax, who only gets resummoned if you have exactly 4 Armor.

name: Giant Tumbleweed!!!
text: Deal 6 damage to all minions. Summon a 6/6 Tumbleweed.
flavorText: Skarr's second-biggest hobby after laying waste to the Badlands is bowling.

name: Harrowing Ox
text: Taunt Battlecry: If you've Excavated twice, your next card this turn costs (7) less.
flavorText: Dead or alive, you're pulling that plow.

name: Huddle Up
text: Fill your board with random Naga.
flavorText: Spell, Naga, Naga, Naga, Naga, Naga, Naga, Naga...

name: Kalimos, Primal Lord
text: Battlecry: If you played an Elemental last turn, cast an Elemental Invocation.
flavorText: All that's missing is a little heart.

name: Kil'jaeden
text: Battlecry: Replace your deck with an endless portal of Demons. Each turn, they gain an additional +2/+2.
flavorText: With complete control of the Burning Legion's forces, Kil'jaeden will stop at nothing until all of the traitorous Draenei have been squelched. *right clicks the enemy hero*

name: Lady Liadrin
text: Battlecry: Add a copy of each spell you cast on friendly characters this game to your hand.
flavorText: When it comes to spells, she loves 'em then she librams.

name: Lesser Diamond Spellstone
text: Resurrect 2 different friendly minions. (Cast 4 spells to upgrade.)
flavorText: A diamond, white, this stone the eighth A precious jewel for those of faith A whispered prayer restores the lost But none among them know the cost.

name: Marin the Manager
text: Battlecry: Choose a fantastic treasure. Shuffle the other 3 into your deck.
flavorText: Mawin! Mawin is what bwings us togethaaa... today.

name: Maruut Stonebinder
text: Battlecry: If your deck started with no duplicates, Discover an Elemental to summon. Add the others to your hand.
flavorText: Savior of the World Pillar, Maruut valiantly fought the Twilight's Hammer to aid Therazane against the Cataclysm.

name: Mythical Terror
text: Lifesteal At the end of your turn, force all enemy minions to attack this.
flavorText: You cannot pet the Terror in Hearthstone.

name: Nozdormu the Eternal
text: Start of Game: If this is in BOTH players' decks, turns are only 15 seconds long.
flavorText: Live life in the fast lane. As long as your opponent does too.

name: Owlonius
text: Spell Damage +1 Your spells get double bonus from Spell Damage.
flavorText: They said you sound like an owl.

name: Pack the House
text: Summon a random 6, 5, 4, and 3-Cost minion. Overload: (2)
flavorText: How many Pack the Houses would a pack house if a pack could house Pack the House?

name: Pipsi Painthoof
text: Deathrattle: Summon a random Divine Shield, Rush, and Taunt minion from your deck.
flavorText: "Earthmother guide my paintbrush strokes, especially on the eyes."

name: Prison of Yogg-Saron
text: Choose a character. Cast 4 random spells (targeting it if possible).
flavorText: "We've finally captured Yogg-Saron! How should we keep him contained?" "How about... an open pit... right below us... with four loose chains?" "PERFECT!"

name: Repackage
text: Stuff all minions into a 2-Cost Box, then shuffle it into the opponent's deck.
flavorText: I don't want to play with you anymore.

name: Sasquawk
text: Battlecry: Repeat each card you played last turn.
flavorText: He makes your last turn this turn. But if you play him next turn, your next turn is this turn. Doing both would make this turn last turn and next turn this turn. Which turn is this next turn last turn?

name: Shining Sentinel
text: Taunt, Elusive Battlecry: Summon a copy of this.
flavorText: OMG, I FINALLY GOT A SHINING SENTINEL AFTER 3 PHASES AND 8192 RESETS!!!!!

name: Siamat
text: Battlecry: Gain 2 of Rush, Taunt, Divine Shield, or Windfury (your choice).
flavorText: TAUNT. TAUNT.

name: Skarr, the Catastrophe
text: Battlecry: Deal damage to all enemies (improved by each turn in a row you've played an Elemental).
flavorText: We're not in Karazhan anymore, Reno.

name: Sleep Under the Stars
text: Choose Thrice - Draw 2 cards; Gain 5 Armor; Refresh 3 Mana Crystals.
flavorText: THRICE?! What's next, FOURTHST?!

name: Snoozin' Zookeeper
text: Battlecry: Summon an 8/8 Beast for your opponent. It attacks all of their minions.
flavorText: You snooze, you lose (track of a very large and hungry panther).

name: Stormwind Champion
text: Your other minions have +1/+1.
flavorText: When Deathwing assaulted the capital, this soldier was the only member of his squad to survive. Now he's all bitter and stuff.

name: Tess Greymane
text: Battlecry: Replay every card from another class you've played this game (targets chosen randomly).
flavorText: Those who cannot remember their card history are doomed to repeat it.

name: The One-Amalgam Band
text: Battlecry: Gain a random bonus effect for each minion of a different type you've played this game. ( )
flavorText: Why be good with ONE instrument when you can be terrible with ALL of them!!!

name: Therazane
text: Taunt Deathrattle: Double the stats of all Elementals in your hand and deck.
flavorText: You thought we forgot about her, didn't you? *nervous laughter*

name: Thirsty Drifter
text: Taunt Costs (1) less for each 1-Cost card you've played this game.
flavorText: Quick! Someone bring her a Manathirst card!

name: Thorignir Drake
text: Rush Whenever this attacks, summon two 3/1 Whelps to attack the target first.
flavorText: Throwing your children at enemies qualifies you for Worst Mother of the Year.

name: Tony, King of Piracy
text: Battlecry: Replace your deck with a copy of your opponent's. Finale: Draw a card.
flavorText: Tony prefers sailing on torrents rather than streams.

name: Toyrannosaurus
text: Rush Deathrattle: Deal 7 damage to a random enemy.
flavorText: This toy WRECKS.

name: Tram Conductor Gerry
text: Battlecry: If you've Excavated twice, summon six 3/3 Tram Cars with Rush.
flavorText: His name is pronounced like 'gif'.

name: Trial by Fire
text: Summon five 1/1 Val'kyr with Rush. When one dies, give the others +1/+1.
flavorText: Well, in ya go.

name: Triple Sevens
text: Deal 7 damage to a minion. Draw 7 cards.
flavorText: If you count the 'seven' in the name, there's actually four total 7s, not three. Huge oversight from the designers.

name: Velen, Leader of the Exiled
text: Taunt. Deathrattle: Trigger the Battlecries and Deathrattles of all other Draenei you played this game.
flavorText: For an exiled dude, he's pretty popular!

name: Wish Upon a Star
text: Give +2/+3 to all minions in your hand, deck, and battlefield.
flavorText: "What are you going to wish for?" "I wish I had just a liiiiiiiittle more Attack and Health!" "...Really? You don't want, like, a million more?"

name: Al'Akir the Windlord
text: Charge, Divine Shield, Taunt, Windfury
flavorText: He is the weakest of the four Elemental Lords. And the other three don't let him forget it.

name: Azerite Giant
text: Costs (1) less for each turn in a row you've played an Elemental.
flavorText: Either that giant isn't really giant, or that doorway is HUGE!

name: Black Hole
text: Destroy all minions except Demons.
flavorText: That's right! The square goes in the black hole.

name: Boomboss Tho'grun
text: Battlecry: Shuffle 3 T.N.T. into your opponent's deck. When drawn, blow up a card in their hand, deck, and board.
flavorText: Ever since the Bloodrock Company hired this guy, business has been booming!

name: Cage Head
text: Deathrattle: Summon a 9/9 Blight Boar with Charge and Taunt.
flavorText: You get your head stuck in a cage ONCE, and all of a sudden you've got a new nickname.

name: Cenarius
text: Choose One - Give your other minions +2/+2; or Summon two 2/2 Treants with Taunt.
flavorText: Yes, he's a demigod. No, he doesn't need to wear a shirt.

name: Colifero the Artist
text: Battlecry: Draw a minion. Transform all other friendly minions into copies of it.
flavorText: You are what you paint! And Colifero is paint.

name: Concert Promo-Drake
text: Tradeable Finale: Destroy an enemy minion.
flavorText: There's a reason why it's promoting the festival instead of playing in it - it's a rhyme-lost protodrake.

name: Crane Game
text: Summon copies of two Demons in your deck.
flavorText: This claw machine is RIGGED! I keep getting demons that bite me!

name: Cultivation
text: Give your minions +2/+2. Costs (1) less for each Treant you've summoned this game.
flavorText: Calling this an 8 mana card is missing the forest for the trees.

name: Deathwing, Mad Aspect
text: Battlecry: Attack ALL other minions.
flavorText: Bite that one, bite that other one, claw this one, swallow that one whole....

name: Deepminer Brann
text: Battlecry: If your deck started with no duplicates, your Battlecries trigger twice for the rest of the game.
flavorText: This is a very on-brannd effect.

name: Draconic Delicacy
text: Rush, Elusive Can only take 1 damage at a time.
flavorText: How to Serve your Dragon.

name: Elise, Badlands Savior
text: Battlecry: If your deck started with no duplicates, summon 5/5 copies of 4 random minions in your deck.
flavorText: From the library to the field, she's proved herself to be a leading intellectual.

name: Enhanced Dreadlord
text: Taunt Deathrattle: Summon a 5/5 Dreadlord with Lifesteal.
flavorText: Photo actually taken across the street in the reflection of a doorknob.

name: Everything Must Go!
text: Summon two random 4-Cost minions. Costs (1) less for each card you've drawn this turn.
flavorText: Go where??

name: Freya, Keeper of Nature
text: Choose One - Duplicate your hand; or Summon copies of all other friendly minions.
flavorText: Good things come in pairs. Good things come in pairs.

name: Grommash Hellscream
text: Charge Has +6 Attack while damaged.
flavorText: Grommash drank the tainted blood of Mannoroth, dooming the orcs to green skin and red eyes! Maybe not his best decision.

name: Hodir, Father of Giants
text: Battlecry: Set the stats of the next three minions you play to 8/8.
flavorText: Giant ladies, this one's a Keeper.

name: Hydration Station
text: Resurrect three of your different highest Cost Taunt minions.
flavorText: They're drinking in herds... they do drink in herds.

name: Illidari Inquisitor
text: Rush. After your hero attacks an enemy, this attacks it too.
flavorText: Armed with fear, big eyes, ruthless efficiency, almost fanatical devotion to your hero, and nice brown robes.

name: Inventor Boom
text: Battlecry: Resurrect two different friendly Mechs that cost (5) or more. They attack random enemies.
flavorText: The best part of inventing stuff is blowing it up!

name: Joymancer Jepetto
text: Battlecry: Get copies of every 1-Attack or 1-Health minion you've played this game.
flavorText: Joymancy (noun): The practice of bringing joy to others through the use of magic. (see also: ethics)

name: Kalecgos
text: Your first spell each turn costs (0). Battlecry: Discover a spell.
flavorText: He was once the Aspect of Magic but gave it up to focus on cheap tricks.

name: Kologarn
text: Rush. Whenever this attacks a minion, put it in your hand. Deathrattle: Move any in your hand to your opponent's.
flavorText: "So am I just supposed to stand here forever, or...?"

name: Lord Jaraxxus
text: Battlecry: Equip a 3/8 Blood Fury.
flavorText: "TRIFLING GNOME! YOUR ARROGANCE WILL BE YOUR UNDOING!!!!"

name: Magtheridon, Unreleased
text: Dormant for 2 turns. While Dormant, deal 3 damage to all enemies at the end of your turn.
flavorText: Playing with this card can be penalized with up to a two-year suspension. Please wait until the card is officially released.

name: Mish-Mash Mosher
text: Rush After this attacks, gain +1 Attack and attack a random enemy minion.
flavorText: In the pit, he feels more alive than ever.

name: Primordial Drake
text: Taunt Battlecry: Deal 2 damage to all other minions.
flavorText: Before he became a rap artist.

name: Prismatic Beam
text: Deal 3 damage to all enemy minions. Costs (1) less for each enemy minion.
flavorText: Seven colors of the rainbow, one for each enemy minion.

name: Ragnaros the Firelord
text: Can't attack. At the end of your turn, deal 8 damage to a random enemy.
flavorText: Ragnaros was summoned by the Dark Iron dwarves, who were eventually enslaved by the Firelord. Summoning Ragnaros often doesnâ€™t work out the way you want it to.

name: Red Giant
text: Costs (1) less for each adjacent card played while in hand.
flavorText: Lots of cards get played around it, but it's the real star.

name: Rheastrasza
text: Battlecry: If your deck started with no duplicates, summon the Purified Dragon Nest.
flavorText: Rheastrasza ascends above loyalty to just her dragonflight to serve all dragonkind. She believes all flights deserve a future and will give her life for the future dragon prince.

name: Shapeless Constellation
text: Battlecry: Transform into an 8/8 copy of a random minion in your hand.
flavorText: Galaxy Brain.

name: Snatch and Grab
text: Destroy two random enemy minions. Costs (1) less for each card you've played from another class.
flavorText: Snatch grabbed the snacks and Grab snatched the grub. The perfect crime.

name: Son of Hodir
text: Battlecry: Shuffle four 8/8 Giants into your deck that are summoned when drawn.
flavorText: You look dehydrated, drink some water! Come on, chug! Chug! Chug! Chug!

name: Soulstealer
text: Battlecry: Destroy all other minions. Gain 1 Corpse for each enemy destroyed.
flavorText: "Wanna see what destruction looks like? Here it is in undead form - it's your boy Soulstealer!"

name: Splitting Spacerock
text: Deathrattle: Summon two 4/4 Splitting Boulders.
flavorText: Space rock. *pew* Spa ce ro ck. *pew* S p a c e r o c k .

name: Storm Giant
text: Taunt Forge: Costs (2) less. Can be Forged endlessly.
flavorText: Storm Giant, Frost Giant, Molten Giant... I want Fair-weather and Sunshine Giant!

name: Stranglethorn Heart
text: Tradeable Resurrect all friendly Beasts that cost (5) or more.
flavorText: The Stranglethorn mentality is to be happy with the bare necessities.

name: The Exodar
text: Battlecry: If you're building a Starship, launch it and choose a Protocol!
flavorText: Limitless potential! Boundless hope! Fourth rate space insurance.

name: The Primus
text: Titan After this uses an ability, Discover a card with that Rune.
flavorText: As there is a Pantheon of titans, so is there also a Pantheon of Death, comprised of powerful rulers in the Shadowlands.

name: Thunderbringer
text: Taunt Deathrattle: Summon an Elemental and Beast from your deck.
flavorText: You can lead a horse to water, but you can't stop it from electrocuting everything in the water.

name: Tirion Fordring
text: Divine Shield, Taunt Deathrattle: Equip a 5/3 Ashbringer.
flavorText: If you haven't heard the Tirion Fordring theme song, it's because it doesn't exist.

name: Twisting Nether
text: Destroy all minions and locations.
flavorText: The Twisting Nether is a formless place of magic and illusion and destroyed minions.

name: Wheel of DEATH!!!
text: Destroy your deck. In 5 turns, destroy the enemy hero.
flavorText: Why don't the good guys ever get a wheel?

name: Wretched Queen
text: Taunt Deathrattle: Summon two 4/6 Knights with Taunt.
flavorText: Mind your head when you're around her.

name: Yogg in the Box
text: Cast 5 random spells. If your deck has no minions, the spells cast cost (5) or more.
flavorText: POP! Goes the Old God!

name: Alexstrasza
text: Battlecry: Set a hero's remaining Health to 15.
flavorText: Alexstrasza the Life-Binder brings life and hope to everyone. Except Deathwing. And Malygos. And Nekros.

name: Annoy-o-Troupe
text: Taunt, Divine Shield Deathrattle: Summon three 1/2 Mechs with Taunt and Divine Shield.
flavorText: Some classes get Void Lords, other classes get Annoyed Lords.

name: Avatar of Hearthstone
text: Battlecry: Open a Standard Pack. Play all cards from it.
flavorText: Now introducing -- Hearthstone Portable!

name: Botface
text: Taunt After this takes damage, get two random Minis.
flavorText: "NOBODY CALLS ME BOTFACE!!" -Botface

name: DJ Manastorm
text: Battlecry: Set the Cost of spells in your hand to (0). After you cast one, the others cost (1) more.
flavorText: Do not sleep on his Tinker Town deep house set - absolutely legendary.

name: Fye, the Setting Sun
text: Rush, Lifesteal, Taunt Costs (1) less for each Dragon you've summoned this game.
flavorText: There is a dragon way down in Bloodrock They call the Setting Sun

name: Imprisoned Horror
text: Costs (1) less for each damage you've taken on your turns this game.
flavorText: Prison changed Jeff.

name: King Plush
text: Charge Battlecry: Return all minions with less Attack than this to their owner's decks.
flavorText: He's so fluffy you're gonna DIE!

name: Malygos the Spellweaver
text: Battlecry: Draw spells until your hand is full.
flavorText: After many years, Malygos has decided mortals can use magic. ALL THE MAGIC!

name: Muensterosity
text: Taunt. At the end of your turn, summon an Elemental with stats equal to this minion's.
flavorText: We were going to put some cheesy joke here, but we goudan't come up with anything.

name: Obsidian Statue
text: Taunt, Lifesteal Deathrattle: Destroy a random enemy minion.
flavorText: The original artist spent many hours with a fine chisel perfecting the facial expression for maximum tauntiness.

name: Odyn, Prime Designate
text: Battlecry: For the rest of the game, after your hero gains Armor, they gain that much Attack for that turn.
flavorText: The best offense is a good defense. 30 defense to be exact.

name: Onyxia the Broodmother
text: At the end of each turn, fill your board with 1/1 Whelps.
flavorText: Throw more dots, throw more dots, more dots, more dots!

name: Sargeras, the Destroyer
text: Titan Battlecry: Open a portal that summons two 3/2 Imps each turn.
flavorText: Formerly the Defender of the Pantheon, he became disillusioned by his mission and formed the Burning Legion to destroy all life within the universe.

name: Sleepy Dragon
text: Taunt
flavorText: Local villagers call her "Naps Under the Mountain."

name: Stitched Giant
text: Costs (1) less for each Corpse you've spent this game.
flavorText: Sew big or go home!

name: Sunset Volley
text: Deal 10 damage randomly split among all enemies. Summon a random 10-Cost minion.
flavorText: When the light is just right during Golden Hour, that is when you take out the selfie stick and start casting.

name: The Scourge
text: Fill your board with random Undead.
flavorText: â€œYou speak of justice? Of cowardice? I will show you the justice of the grave and the true meaning of fear.â€

name: Travelmaster Dungar
text: Battlecry: Summon three minions from your deck that are from different expansions.
flavorText: Our travel options will take you to Paradise and beyond!

name: Walking Mountain
text: Rush, Lifesteal, Mega-Windfury Overload: (2)
flavorText: The hills are alive with the sound of YEEEEHAAAWWWW!

name: Yogg-Saron, Unleashed
text: Titan After this uses an ability, cast two random spells.
flavorText: Has been known to monologue before he strikes.

name: Ysera
text: At the end of your turn, get two random Dream cards.
flavorText: Ysera rules the Emerald Dream. Which is some kind of green-mirror-version of the real world, or something?

name: Amplified Elekk
text: Taunt Deathrattle: Deal 3 damage to all enemy minions.
flavorText: Before this show can continue, we have to bass-boost the elephant in the room.

name: Banjosaur
text: Rush Whenever this attacks, draw a Beast and gain its stats.
flavorText: You'll all be singing along once he gets to the tyranno-chorus.

name: Climactic Necrotic Explosion
text: Lifesteal. Deal damage. Summon / Souls. (Randomly improved by Corpses you've spent)
flavorText: The less legible the band's logo, the more hardcore it is.

name: Deathwing the Destroyer
text: Battlecry: Destroy all other minions. Discard a card for each destroyed.
flavorText: "Heâ€™s Deathwing? That one's Deathwing? You're Deathwing!? I'm DEATHWING! ARE THERE ANY OTHER DEATHWINGS I SHOULD KNOW ABOUT?"

name: Eonar, the Life-Binder
text: Titan After this uses an ability, summon a 5/5 Ancient with Taunt.
flavorText: Protector of all living things, she once saved the nascent world-soul of Azeroth from annihilation. It seems mercy was her greatest wisdom.

name: Factory Assemblybot
text: Miniaturize At the end of your turn, summon a 6/7 Bot that attacks a random enemy.
flavorText: I call it Mini-me.

name: Living Horizon
text: Taunt, Divine Shield Costs (1) less for each other card in your hand.
flavorText: Even in the darkest of days, the sun never sets on the Badlands.

name: Reno, Lone Ranger
text: Battlecry: If your deck started with no duplicates, empty the enemy board and limit it to 1 space for a turn.
flavorText: With an uncertain past and a questionable future, Reno was lucky to find his home on the range.

name: Safety Expert
text: Rush. Deathrattle: Shuffle three Bombs into your opponent's deck.
flavorText: Remember: Always wear your helmet when strapped to a bajillion explosives.

name: Sea Giant
text: Costs (1) less for each other minion on the battlefield.
flavorText: See? Giant.

name: Sea Shanty
text: Summon three 5/5 Pirates. Costs (1) less for each spell you've cast on characters this game.
flavorText: Time for some well-earned arrr and arrr.

name: Seaside Giant
text: Costs (2) less for each time you've used a location this game.
flavorText: Everywhere's the shallow end when you're 88 feet tall.

name: Table Flip
text: Deal 3 damage to all enemy minions. Costs (1) less for each other card in your hand.
flavorText: "Judge!"

name: The Galactic Projection Orb
text: Recast a random spell of each Cost you've cast this game (targets enemies if possible).
flavorText: Look closely in the ball and you'll see the expansion of space and time itself. Or their projections, anyway.

name: Tsunami
text: Summon four 3/6 Water Elementals that Freeze. They attack random enemies.
flavorText: Hop in, the water's cold! And angry. And alive.

name: Chained Guardian
text: Rush, Reborn Costs (1) less for each Plague shuffled into the enemy deck this game.
flavorText: Eternally jealous of the Unchained Gladiator.

name: Mountain Giant
text: Costs (1) less for each other card in your hand.
flavorText: His mother said that he was just big boned.

name: Playhouse Giant
text: Costs (1) less for each card you've drawn this game.
flavorText: WARNING: NOT A PLAYHOUSE. DO NOT ATTEMPT TO CLIMB.

name: Reska, the Pit Boss
text: Rush. Costs (1) less for each minion that died this game. Deathrattle: Take control of a random enemy minion.
flavorText: Overseer of the Bloodrock Mine, Reska will work you to the bone. They'll then reanimate your bones and work THOSE bones to the bone.

name: Molten Giant
text: Costs (1) less for each Health your hero is missing.
flavorText: He gets terrible heartburn. BECAUSE HE IS FULL OF LAVA.

name: Fanottem, Lord of the Opera
text: Taunt, Lifesteal This card's Cost is equal to the amount of cards in your deck.
flavorText: Writing a compelling symphony takes time. Usually around 20 turns or more.

name: The Ceaseless Expanse
text: Costs (1) less for each time a card was drawn, played, or destroyed. Battlecry: Destroy all other minions.
flavorText: If you play this for its full Mana cost, you know what? You win. Good day sir!
